definition: liquid water (as opposed to steam or ice)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: A condensate removal port allows liquid water to be removed.
sentences.chinese: 一凝析油去除港口允許液態水被清除掉。

sentences.english: An extrasolar planet that could support liquid water finally showed itself in September.
sentences.chinese: 一個能夠支持液態水的太陽系外行星9月份終於出現。

sentences.english: It may be alternatively expressed as pressure potential-the hydrostatic pressure to which water in a liquid phase is subjected.
sentences.chinese: 膨壓也可以用壓力勢表示，即液態水產生的靜水壓。

sentences.english: Given the ubiquity of water, it seems probable that this thing actually has liquid water.
sentences.chinese: 水是無處不在的，似乎這顆行星上就存在液態水。
